original_text: The Son of Man must die in the way that the Bible says. But it will be very bad for the man who gives me to my enemies. It would be better for that man if he had not been born.’
korean_text: 인자는 자기에 대하여 기록된 대로 가거니와 인자를 파는 그 사람에게는 화가 있으리로다 그 사람은 차라리 태어나지 아니하였더라면 제게 좋을 뻔하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man must die
in the way that the Bible says
But it will be very bad
for the man who gives me to my enemies
It would be better for that man
if he had not been born
